attributes.action: Stop Benefits and bring in food vouchers to stop the unemployed getting more than the employed!
attributes.additional_details:
as a working class citizens we know that coming home from work seeing the unemployed playing games and sitting on there ass all day getting tattoos and all sorts is making our country a mess and making the employed crippled.

Now is the time to change and make Britain Great again and stop people getting benefits and give them food vouchers instead!
